modName: Ningheim Racemenu Preset - Lillian - The Dead Red Assassin
summary: Lillian, a freckled ningheim racemenu preset.
descriptionHtml:
My first preset ever, Lillian is a Ningheim freckled assassin who knows what she's doing. This SELF-RESPECTING BADASS is ready to give everyone and anyone a beat down.

----------------
(Backstory - For those who care)
The last member of an ancient tribe prefers to stay in the wilderness, but when she steps out into the harsh outside world, crazy things start happening.

The prophecy of the dragons had been a favorite of hers as a child, but she had written it off as nonsense in her mind. When found crossing the border, she is taken to be executed, when that stupid story became very real.
----------------Please use enb!! Looks very bad without it, but I will work on a version designed for no enb.

Instructions:
1) Place .NIF and .DDS file in Skyrim>Data>SKSE>Plugins>Chargen
2) Place .jslot file in Skyrim>Data>SKSE>Plugins>Chargen>Presets
3) ingame, go into racemenu, go to the sculpt tag(top right of screen), press F9, and load 'Lillian.nif'
4) Then go into the preset tag(also top right) and select the 'Lillian2' file.
5)Voila, done!

Required Mods.

Racemenu(DUH):
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624
Ningheim Race:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474
Freckle Mania:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841
SRG Female textures-Google it

KS Hairdos-Renewal:https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311


Used in screenshots:
Enb: Custom, but I recommend SnapDragon enb by tetrodoxin or Caffeine enb by ZwabberdieBo
Armor: The Witcher 3 female armors by zzjay and Katarina aror by newermind43
Body: UNP nevernude by elianora

All credit goes to above mods.

Feel free to add screenshots! [SFW if possible, please. :)]
author: tigerzeusy
